description_html:
One part abstract art, one part functional light, Shroom is a loose artistic impression resembling a mushroom. The LED pendant’s gills are comprised of 30 vertical aluminum blades held together by intricate and clever milled aluminum top and bottom caps. Illuminated from within its acrylic core and a down light, Shroom features 12 volt energy efficient LEDs, creating a mesmerizing display as light reflects from the aluminum blades.

Shroom is a nothing if not an innovative lighting design. Created for an Alice in Wonderland-themed bar display at IDS Vancouver 2016, lead designer Maurice L. Dery “travelled down the rabbit hole” when creating this pendant.

Providing both mood and task lighting, Shroom can be suspended on its own or hung with a multiple pendant arrangement. Each viewing angle produces a new result.

Project specs: The light is 584.2 mm diameter x 405.3 mm high. Designed Fall 2016.

Finishes available: Brasslike light gold, silver or black.
